name: TheMaze!
description:
Welcome to TheMaze! it is a fun little puzzle game that was created in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam, 

In it you control 2 squares ( at the same time ) that have to try to get to the green portal :D ( btw this is my 1st game made for a game jam :P  ) have fun! 

Controls: A D and space
